name: Allmageddon
effect: Unique

name: Barath Beyond
effect:
C:40 P:85 W:15 S:60

Fire 5 (Fire attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)

name: Blaze Barrage
effect: Fire, Air: Draw an Attack Card, then discard an Attack Card.

name: Blazier
effect:
C:35 P:40 W:60 S:25

name: Blazvatan the Epic Warbeast
effect:
C:150 P:75 W:50 S:150

Intimidate: Wisdom 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Wisdom.)
Brains or brawn? One can't decide... and one doesn't need to.

name: Carnival of Confusion
effect: When Carnival of Confusion becomes the active Location, Creatures lose all Elemental Types. If a Creature lost Fire this way, it gains Water. If a Creature lost Water, it gains Air. If a Creature lost Air, it gain Earth. If a Creature lost Earth, it gains Fire.
Elemental attacks deal an additional 5 damage.

name: Cascading Rondo
effect: Swap your Attack Discard pile with your Attack Deck, the shuffle your Attack Deck.
Though he appeared exhausted, he was merely getting his second wind.

name: Castle Bodhran
effect: At the beginning of combat, each player may return a Mugic Card from their discard pile to their hand.
This strange stronghold is built in a style that might best be called "bizzarechitecture."

name: Castle Pillar
effect: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged creature, it gains a Mugic counter.
Unique

name: Challor
effect: Equipped Creature cannot be the target of abilities. Reveal Challor Battlegear at beginning of game.

name: Chaor
effect:
C:95 P:90 W:70 S:60

3MC: Negate target OverWorld Mugic or ability that targets Chaor.
Unique, Loyal
"We'll take Kiru City and the UnderWorld will rule all of Perim!"

name: Chorus of Cothica
effect: Target Creature may play Mugic of any tribe.
Some speak of the one true song, the Mugic that unites all Perim.

name: Coil Crush
effect: Stat Check Power 75: Choose a Battlegear equipped to an opposing Creature and destroy it.

name: Crawsectus
effect:
C:60 P:50 W:50 S:25

name: Cyclone Slam
effect: If your engaged Creature is a Warbeast, deal 20 damage.

name: Danian Carapace
effect: When equipped Creature deals damage to an Uninfected Creature, Infect that Creature.

name: Drakness
effect:
C:65 P:45 W:85 S:50

Mugic played by Creatures you control that deal damage deal an additional 5 damage.

name: Dranakis Threshold
effect: Mugic and abilities cannot be played.

name: Elemental Elegy
effect: Target Creature loses an Elemental Type of your choice. If that Creature has no Elemental Types, it cannot move instead.

name: Elemental Oxidation

name: Enre-hep
effect:
When a Creature you control is put into your discard pile from play, Enre-Hep gains [1MC] for each Mugic counter on that Creature. [1MC]: Target Creature gains "Recklessness 5" until end of turn. Enre-Hep may not enter mixed armies.

name: Fearocity
effect: Stat Check Courage 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Flame Orb
effect: Stat Check Power 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Fortissimo

name: Frost Blight
effect: Stat Check Speed 75: Deal 10 damage.

effect:

name: Illazar
effect:
C:45 P:70 W:60 S:55

name: Infight
effect: If opposing engaged Creature is Danian, Activate Hive. Hive may not be Deactivated.

name: Interlude of Consequence
